nodes.bodyText: These are both null. You just set them to null! I don't understand!
Can never be too sure in Java! :) I plan to resolve the conflicts and can look at why I might have done this.
May as well use StringUtils.isEmpty here.
This wasn't even code I changed, but I can update it!
It's also possible that isBlank could cause a regression here since it isn't the same behavior but probably unlikely.
